data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Pallisa, Uganda so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pallisa, Uganda
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Pallisa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in Pallisa, Uganda.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Pallisa.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Pallisa, Uganda to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 4,212,781 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Nubian people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Pallisa, Uganda. Please, stir the 2,088,919 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, bring yourself glory in Pallisa. Through your servants plant 1,260 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Pallisa do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

location.name: Pallisa
location.people_groups_list: Kaliko, Arab, Lebanese, Swahili, Gujarati, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kaliko (13,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Swahili (5,100), Gujarati (465,000), Hindi (5,800)
